issue.title: [C++] Add pkg-config to conda_env_cpp.yml
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4751](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4751). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once the CMake refactor has been merged, we should add `pkg-config` to the dependencies as it should be also available for Windows now: https://github.com/conda-forge/pkg-config-feedstock/pull/27 This will simplify some packaging.
